_sText:
Deathrun Steam Works is basicaly seventh sense, except it looks a whole lot better, it has been made fairer, all the bugs (that i know of) have been fixed and better sounds have been added.

Deathrun Steam Works is a very balanced map, good for all skills of death runners. The map has 155 spawn points (no idea why I didn’t stop at 64). It is based in an abstract metal tunnelling system with a lot of wood.

Here are the traps in the DeathRun:

1. Reverse break floor
2. Fire platform
3. Double crusher arms
4. Fan hall
5. Deadly steam jets
6. Floor drop
7. Electric wire
8. Giant hammer
9. Floor smackers
10. Gear grinder
11. Flying barrels
12. Spinning floor thingys
13. Laser crusher
14. Exploding barrel jump (no terrorist)
15. Spinning gear, wall trap
16. Good ol’ crusher

The Mini-Games at the end of my map include:

1. Deadly saw blade cannon knife arena
2. Easy bunny hop
3. Duck shootout, fairground style!

The map also includes:

1. A giant 7
2. A spiral grenade
3. A smoke grenade
4. And a secret ending

The map also has all the Anti-AFK feature needed to keep the game running smoothly which means that an admin doesn’t always have to be present to stop those annoying AFK people.
